name: Death Road to Doggy Town
description:
Another day on Miami Beach! Perfect to practice skateboard tricks! Ziggi the Dog is taking Bailey on her daily walk and they're feelin' the vibes. Also there's a zombie horde chasing them, but the VIBES.

How to play:

You play as Bailey, and Ziggi the Dog controls most of your movement. You have a little movement to either side, though. When Ziggi the Dog drags you to an obstacle with yellow, you can do a trick! Try to get as high of a score as you can!

Right and left arrow keys - Move side-to-side

Space bar - Do a RAD trick! (Hold space bar to grind on rail)

Credits:

Mitch/chonibi: Programming

Will/willozeas: Sound, music, programming

Charlotte/Sharktea1: 2D art, animation

Arka/arka2_arka9: 2D art
